name: Federal obligations for R&D, by agency and performer: FY 2021
description: Federal obligations for R&D, by agency and performer: FY 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_extramural_united_states_and_u_s_territories_businesses
variableMeasured.description: Extramural United States And U S Territories Businesses

variableMeasured.name: field_extramural_united_states_and_u_s_territories_higher_educationb
variableMeasured.description: Extramural United States And U S Territories Higher Educationb

variableMeasured.description: Extramural United States And U S Territories State And Local Governments

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Because of rounding, detail may not add to total. As of volume 71 (FYs 2021–22), FFRDCs are presented as intramural R&D, whereas they were presented as extramural in previous survey data. Data in trend tables have been revised to reflect the new classification. Only those agencies and subdivisions that had obligations in variables represented by this table appear in the table. FY 2021 obligations include additional funding provided by supplemental COVID-19 pandemic-related appropriations (e.g., Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security [CARES] Act).
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Federal Funds for Research and Development, FYs 2021–22.
